Name: Alter Ego
Text: Even Tier minions in Bob's Tavern have +7/+7. (Swaps to Odd next turn!)

Name: Anima Bribe
Text: After you sell a minion, give its stats to a minion in Bob's Tavern.

Name: Another Hidden Body
Text: Discover a minion of your Tavern Tier. (Can be earned endlessly!)

Name: Beyond the Mirage
Text: Tavern spells cost (1) less.

Name: Blood Goblet
Text: At the end of your turn, give your right-most minion Attack equal to your missing Health.

Name: Bloodsoaked Tome
Text: Minions in Bob's Tavern cost 2 Gold.

Name: Boom Squad
Text: Avenge (3): Deal 10 damage to the highest Health enemy minion.

Name: Cooked Book
Text: After you buy a minion, give it +1/+1 and upgrade this.

Name: Cycle of Energy
Text: Avenge (4): Get a random Tavern spell.

Name: Devils in the Details
Text: At the end of your turn, your left and right-most minions consume a minion in Bob's Tavern.

Name: Divine Armor
Text: At the end of your turn, give the left-most minion in your hand +8/+8 and Divine Shield.

Name: Doppelganger's Locket
Text: After each combat, Discover a non-Golden minion from your last opponent's warband. It keeps enchantments.

Name: Double-Headed Reward
Text: The first time you buy a card each turn, get an extra copy of it.

Name: Endless Blood Moon
Text: Your Blood Gems give an extra +2/+2. At the start of your turn, add two to your hand.

Name: Enhance-a-matic
Text: At the start of your turn, get an Enhanced Part that gives +5/+5 and a random bonus.

Name: Essence of Zerus
Text: At the end of your turn, get a 'Shifter Zerus' which transforms into random minions.

Name: Ethereal Evidence
Text: At the start of every turn, choose from 2 new Rewards.

Name: Evil Twin
Text: Start of Combat: Summon a copy of your highest-Health minion.

Name: Ghastly Mask
Text: Add 'another card' to your hand. Your end of turn effects trigger an extra time.

Name: Gift of the Golden Kobold
Text: After you Refresh 5 times, make the highest Tier minion in the Tavern Golden.

Name: Gilnean War Horn
Text: Add [a specified "Battlecry" minion] to your hand. Your Battlecries trigger an extra time.

Name: Hidden Treasure Vault
Text: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Gold. (Upgrades each turn!)

Name: Ice Sickle
Text: Avenge (1): Give a minion in your hand +3 Attack.

Name: Invigorating Conch
Text: When you buy a minion, give its stats to a random friendly minion.

Name: Kidnap Sack
Text: Spellcraft: Choose a non-Golden minion. Add it to your hand.

Name: Map of the Unknown
Text: After you play a minion of a type you don't control, give a friendly minion of each type +2/+1.

Name: Menagerie Mayhem
Text: At the end of your turn, give your minions +1 Attack for each friendly minion type.

Name: Mirror Shield
Text: After each Refresh, give a minion in Bob's Tavern +6/+6 and Divine Shield.

Name: Open Auditions
Text: At the start of your turn, Discover a Buddy.

Name: Partner in Crime
Text: Get your Golden Buddy.

Name: Pilfered Lamps
Text: You only need 2 copies of a minion to make it Golden.

Name: Red Hand
Text: At the start of your turn, give a minion in your hand +12/+12.

Name: Ritual Dagger
Text: After a friendly Deathrattle minion dies, give it +5/+5 permanently.

Name: Scepter of Guidance
Text: Bob's Tavern always offers 2 [randomly selected type] when Refreshed.

Name: Secret Culprit
Text: Get [a particular Tier 7 minion].

Name: Secret Sinstone
Text: After you Discover a card, get an extra copy of it.

Name: Sinfall Medallion
Text: After you play a minion, give 2 other friendly minions of its Tavern Tier +4/+4.

Name: Snicker Snacks
Text: At the end of your turn, 2 friendly minions trigger their Battlecries.

Name: Soul Pact
Text: After you play a minion, give other minions of the same type +1/+1.

Name: Splitting Scroll
Text: Whenever you buy a Tavern spell that costs (3) or more, get an extra copy of it.

Name: Stable Amalgamation
Text: Avenge (7): When you have space, summon a 50/50 Amalgam.

Name: Staff of Origination
Text: Start of Combat: Give your minions +12/+12.

Name: Stash of the Scribe
Text: At the start of each turn, get 3 random Tavern spells.

Name: Stolen Gold
Text: Start of Combat: Make your left and right-most minions Golden.

Name: Sturdy Shard
Text: At the end of your turn, give your minions without Taunt +1/+2 for each Taunt minion you control.

Name: Teal Tiger Sapphire
Text: Minions in Bob's Tavern have +1/+1 for each time it was Refreshed this turn.

Name: Temporal Tampering
Text: Your Tavern spells cast twice.

Name: The Friends Along the Way
Text: At the start of your turn, get 2 random [specified minion type].

Name: The Golden Hammer
Text: Spellcraft: Make a friendly minion Golden until next turn.

Name: The Smoking Gun
Text: Your minions have +4 Attack.

Name: Theotar's Parasol
Text: At the end of your turn, give your right-most minion Stealth until next turn and +8 Health.

Name: Timeline Acceleration
Text: At the start of your turn, get two Accelerators that transform a minion into one from a Tavern Tier higher.

Name: Tiny Henchmen
Text: At the end of your turn, give +3/+3 to 3 friendly minions of Tier 3 or lower.

Name: Transm-ogre-fication
Text: At the end of your turn, set your lowest Health minion's stats equal to your highest Health minion's stats.

Name: Tumbling Disaster
Text: Whenever you summon a minion in combat, give it +1/+1. Avenge (4): Upgrade this permanently.

Name: Turbulent Tombs
Text: Add [a specified "Deathrattle" minion] to your hand. Your Deathrattles trigger an extra time.

Name: Victim's Specter
Text: After each combat, get a plain copy of the last friendly minion that died.

Name: Volatile Venom
Text: Your minions have +7/+7. After they attack, they die. Horribly.

Name: Wondrous Wisdomball
Text: Occasionally gives helpful Refreshes.

Name: Yogg-tastic Tasties
Text: At the start of your turn, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.
